prompt_base: narcissistic Spanish matador, intense piercing gaze, long blonde hair, sharp silver mask, red and gold flamboyant costume, theatrical lighting, 8k realistic photo
feature_prompt: polished metallic mask texture, individual realistic hair strands, detailed silk fabric on costume, visible makeup, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, messy hair, blurry, normal clothing, plain face, plastic mask
